title: Learner-Centered Project-Based Curriculum for Strengthening Mathematical Vocabulary Competencies in Professional Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A learner cohort comprising professionals in medical/legal/technical fields, where mastery of mathematics-related specialized vocabulary is essential for job performance

learning_goals: Learners can solve job-related problems with 80% accuracy using specialized mathematical terminology.
Learners can improve vocabulary utilization skills by 20% through peer and self-assessment in project-based activities.
Learners can systematically explain lexical applications of mathematical concepts through learning activities based on Gagné’s Nine Events of Instruction model.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
